thread.title: Francis Bean Shares Note in Honor of Kurt Cobain's 50th Birthday
thread.title_full: Francis Bean Shares Note in Honor of Kurt Cobain's 50th Birthday

author: audra@dailydot.com (Audra Schroeder)
title: Francis Bean Shares Note in Honor of Kurt Cobain's 50th Birthday
text:
Screengrab via WatchMojo.com/YouTube BTW 
Today would have been Kurt Cobain 's 50th birthday, and daughter Frances Bean shared a note on Instagram in his honor. A post shared by Frances Bean Cobain (@space_witch666) on Feb 20, 2017 at 12:01am PST Cobain died on April 5, 1994. The 2015 HBO doc Montage of Heck offers a look into Cobain's archives and some scenes with baby Frances. It's worth revisiting today.
